import React, { useEffect, useState}from 'react'; import logoImg from '../../assets/logo.svg'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import './styles.css' import api from '../../services/api' import { FiPower, FiTrash2 } from 'react-icons/fi' export default function Profile(){ const ongId = localStorage.getItem('ongId'); const ongName = localStorage.getItem('ongName'); const [incidents, setIncidents] = useState([]); useEffect(()=>{ const resposta = api.get('profile',{ headers :{ Authorization: ongId, } }).then( resp => { setIncidents(resp.data); }) },[]) return(
Bem vinda, {ongName} Cadastrar novo caso
